Class XoxEndingAnalyzer

    public class XoxEndingAnalyzer

    Util class to determine whether a given xox board state implies that the game is ended.

    • Method Detail

      • analyzeAndUpdate

        public boolean analyzeAndUpdate​(XoxGameReadOnly game)
                         throws LogicException
        Verifies whether the game already fulfils any end criteria. Marks the game as finished, if at least criterion one detected.
        Specified by:
        analyzeAndUpdate in interface EndingAnalyzer
        Parameters:
        game - as the xox game object to be analysed and potentially flagged as finished.
        Returns:
        boolean to indicate whether the game is already finished.
        Throws:
        LogicException
